author: Xbox
description:
The legendary Space Pirate is back! Prepare to fight the Pirate Guild and relive the thrills of the iconic anime in Space Adventure Cobra - The Awakening, landing on Xbox Series on August 26th!

Wishlist now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/space-adventure-cobra-the-awakening/9ng380c5xmlv

Dive into a fast-paced action-platformer set in a rich and varied sci-fi universe. Use your gadgets to get out of dangerous situations and master your Psychogun to bend your shots for even greater effectiveness.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR
